<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

## credential-ld package

Provides a [plugin](./credential-ld.credentialissuerld.md) for the [Agent](./core.agent.md) that implements [ICredentialIssuerLD](./credential-ld.icredentialissuerld.md) interface.

This plugin adds support for working with JSON-LD credentials. When installed, this plugin will be automatically used by [CredentialPlugin](./credential-w3c.credentialplugin.md) if the user requests the credential to be signed by one of the installed signature suites.

## Classes

| Class                                                       | Description                                                                                                |
| ----------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [CredentialIssuerLD](./credential-ld.credentialissuerld.md) | A Veramo plugin that implements the [ICredentialIssuerLD](./credential-ld.icredentialissuerld.md) methods. |

## Interfaces

| Interface                                                                                     | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [ICreateVerifiableCredentialLDArgs](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablecredentialldargs.md)     | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Encapsulates the parameters required to create a [W3C Verifiable Credential](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#credentials)</p><p>This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.</p>     |
| [ICreateVerifiablePresentationLDArgs](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablepresentationldargs.md) | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Encapsulates the parameters required to create a [W3C Verifiable Presentation](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#presentations)</p><p>This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.</p> |
| [ICredentialIssuerLD](./credential-ld.icredentialissuerld.md)                                 | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The interface definition for a plugin that can issue and verify Verifiable Credentials and Presentations that use JSON-LD format (also called Data Integrity Proofs).                                 |
| [IVerifyCredentialLDArgs](./credential-ld.iverifycredentialldargs.md)                         | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Encapsulates the parameters required to verify a [W3C Verifiable Credential](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#credentials)</p><p>This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice</p>      |
| [IVerifyPresentationLDArgs](./credential-ld.iverifypresentationldargs.md)                     | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Encapsulates the parameters required to verify a [W3C Verifiable Presentation](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#presentations)</p><p>This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.</p> |

## Variables

| Variable                                                  | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| --------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [LdDefaultContexts](./credential-ld.lddefaultcontexts.md) | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Provides a hardcoded map of common Linked Data <code>@context</code> definitions.</p><p>You can use this to bootstrap the <code>@context</code> definitions used by [CredentialIssuerLD](./credential-ld.credentialissuerld.md) with these common context definitions.</p><p>This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.</p> |
| [schema](./credential-ld.schema.md)                       | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The parameter and return types schemas for the [CredentialIssuerLD](./credential-ld.credentialissuerld.md) plugin methods.</p><p>This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.</p>                                                                                                                                             |

| Type Alias                                              | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| ------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [ContextDoc](./credential-ld.contextdoc.md)             | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Describes a document with a <code>@context</code> property.</p><p>This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.</p>                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [IRequiredContext](./credential-ld.irequiredcontext.md) | <p><b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Represents the requirements that this plugin has. The agent that is using this plugin is expected to provide these methods.</p><p>This interface can be used for static type checks, to make sure your application is properly initialized.</p><p>This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.</p> |
